alert.note: Alert for Grant; Morton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 5:54PM CDT until April 22 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Eastern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Richfield, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City and Big Bow. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
